amendment.description: Amendment to increase Environmental Restoration, Navy funding by $34,734,000 and decrease Operations and Maintenance, Defense-Wide by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part B of House Report 115-261 to increase Environmental Restoration, Navy funding by $34,734,000 and decrease Operations and Maintenance, Defense-Wide by $34,734,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Suozzi amendment (A048) Agreed to by recorded vote: 214 - 211 (Roll no. 430).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Suozzi amendment (A048) Agreed to by recorded vote: 214 - 211 (Roll no. 430).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A048) offered by Mr. Suozzi.
